author: Flats Man

review: I had this for a month and got it from Best Buy. I found it to be pretty useless. The only things you can stream to the TV were if they are in a Google Crome broswer, Youtube, Hulu, or Netflix. I am rather better off with just connecting my desktop to the TV directly though an HDMI cable. In addition, the devices that stream drain quickly trying to keep up a signal going to cromecast. I suggest only buying this if you plan on just using it to stream content from google crome or youtube. It can't do anything else!
